Perform a New Body Feature Operation to create a new solid body. Description The resulting shape is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the prism are 2 units by 3 units by 4 units. - Shape: A rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom.
